SELECT stat_level_online_time.log_day AS log_day, stat_level_online_time.`level` AS `level`, SUM(stat_level_online_time.num) AS num, SUM(stat_level_online_time.tot) AS tot, avg(dt) as dt FROM stat_level_online_time WHERE 1 = 1 and log_day >= replace(#{createDateStart},'-','') and log_day <= replace(#{createDateEnd},'-','')
AND area_id IN
#{item}
GROUP BY stat_level_online_time.`log_day`, stat_level_online_time.`level` ORDER BY stat_level_online_time.log_day DESC, stat_level_online_time.`level` ASC

SELECT
stat_level_online_time.`level` `level`, SUM(stat_level_online_time.tot) AS sum_tot, SUM(stat_level_online_time.dt)/COUNT(1) AS per_dt FROM stat_level_online_time WHERE 1 = 1 and log_day >= replace(#{createDateStart},'-','') and log_day <= replace(#{createDateEnd},'-','')
AND area_id IN
#{item}
GROUP BY
stat_level_online_time.`level` ORDER BY stat_level_online_time.`level`
